entities.name: harry
entities.description: The person being referred to as 'Not Harry' by the woman. The text describes him as someone who is not the target of her warning.

entities.name: the child
entities.description: The baby in the crib who remains silent throughout the scene. The text describes him as looking up at the intruder with interest.

entities.name: the woman
entities.description: The person who is trying to protect Harry and begging for mercy. She drops like her husband when the green light flashes.

entities.name: the husband
entities.description: The woman's husband who also falls down when the green light flashes.

entities.name: the intruder
entities.description: The person who is trying to harm Harry and the child. The text describes him as pointing a wand at the child.

relationships.description: The woman warns that she will do anything to protect Harry.
The intruder is trying to harm Harry.
The intruder points a wand at the child.
Both the woman and her husband fall down when the green light flashes.
